Item 3.03 - Material Modification to Rig.content: On February 4, 2025, JPMorgan Chase & Co. (the “Company”) issued 300,000 shares (the “Shares”) of the Company’s 6.500% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-CumulativePreferred Stock, Series OO, par value of $1.00 per share and with a liquidation preference of $10,000 per share (the “Series OO Preferred Stock”), which Shares were deposited against delivery of depositary receipts (the “Depositary Receipts”) evidencing 3,000,000 depositary shares (the “Depositary Shares”), each representing a one-tenthinterest in a Share, issued by Computershare Inc., as depositary. Under the terms of the Series OO Preferred Stock, the ability of the Company to pay dividends on, make distributions with respect to, or to redeem, purchase or acquire, or make a liquidation payment on its common stock or any preferred stock ranking on a parity with or junior to the Series OO Preferred Stock, will be subject to restrictions in the event that the Company does not declare dividends on the Series OO Preferred Stock for the most recently completed dividend period or, in the case of any such liquidation payment, does not pay to holders of the Series OO Preferred Stock liquidation distributions of $10,000 per Share, plus any declared and unpaid dividends. The terms of the Series OO Preferred Stock are more fully described in the Certificate of Designations (as defined below), which establishes the rights, preferences, privileges, qualifications, restrictions and limitations relating to the Series OO Preferred Stock. Copies of the Certificate of Designations and the form of certificate representing the Series OO Preferred Stock are included as Exhibit 3.1 and Exhibit 4.1, respectively, to this Current Report on Form 8-Kand are incorporated by reference herein. The terms of the Depositary Shares are set forth in the Deposit Agreement, dated February 4, 2025, among the Company, Computershare Inc., as depositary, and the holders from time to time of the Depositary Receipts issued thereunder (the “Deposit Agreement”) and the form of Depositary Receipt. Copies of the Deposit Agreement and the form of Depositary Receipt are included as Exhibit 4.2 and Exhibit 4.3, respectively, to this Current Report on Form 8-Kand are incorporated by reference herein.

subsections.issuance_details: On February 4, 2025, JPMorgan Chase & Co. issued 300,000 shares of its 6.500% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series OO, with a par value of $1.00 per share and a liquidation preference of $10,000 per share. These shares were deposited against delivery of 3,000,000 depositary shares, each representing a one-tenth interest in a preferred share, issued by Computershare Inc., as depositary.
subsections.dividend_and_payment_restrictions: The ability of the Company to pay dividends, make distributions, redeem, purchase, or make a liquidation payment on its common stock or any parity or junior preferred stock is restricted if the Company fails to declare dividends on the Series OO Preferred Stock for the most recent dividend period or fails to pay the full liquidation distribution of $10,000 per share plus any declared and unpaid dividends.
subsections.document_references: The terms of the Series OO Preferred Stock are detailed in the Certificate of Designations (Exhibit 3.1) and the form of certificate (Exhibit 4.1). The terms of the Depositary Shares are set forth in the Deposit Agreement (Exhibit 4.2) and the form of Depositary Receipt (Exhibit 4.3).

Item 5.03 - Amendments to Articles of In.content: On February 3, 2025, the Company filed a Certificate of Designations, Powers, Preferences and Rights with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware, establishing the rights, preferences, privileges, qualifications, restrictions and limitations relating to the Series OO Preferred Stock (the “Certificate of Designations”). The Certificate of Designations became effective with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware upon filing. A copy of the Certificate of Designations is included as Exhibit 3.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-Kand is incorporated by reference herein.

subsections.filing_details: On February 3, 2025, the Company filed a Certificate of Designations, Powers, Preferences and Rights with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware.
subsections.purpose: The filing establishes the rights, preferences, privileges, qualifications, restrictions, and limitations for the Series OO Preferred Stock.
subsections.effective_date: The Certificate of Designations became effective upon filing.
subsections.exhibit_reference: A copy of the Certificate of Designations is included as Exhibit 3.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-K.

Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On February 4, 2025, the Company completed the issuance and sale of 300,000 Shares, which Shares were deposited against delivery of Depositary Receipts evidencing 3,000,000 Depositary Shares, pursuant to an Underwriting Agreement, dated January 28, 2025, among the Company, J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and the other several underwriters named therein. The sale of the Depositary Shares was made pursuant to the Company’s Registration Statement on Form S-3(File No. 333-263304),as amended. In connection with this offering, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Depositary Shares and the Series OO Preferred Stock is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-K.

subsections.transaction_completion: On February 4, 2025, the Company completed the issuance and sale of 300,000 Shares (evidencing 3,000,000 Depositary Shares) pursuant to an Underwriting Agreement dated January 28, 2025.
subsections.registration_details: The sale was made pursuant to the Company’s Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File No. 333-263304).
subsections.legal_opinion: A legal opinion regarding the legality of the Depositary Shares and the Series OO Preferred Stock is filed as Exhibit 5.1.

Item 9.01 - Financial Statements and Exh.content: (d) Exhibits. 3.1 - Certificate of Designations, Powers, Preferences and Rights of JPMorgan Chase & Co., establishing the rights, preferences, privileges, qualifications, restrictions and limitations relating to the 6.500% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series OO, filed February 3, 2025. 4.1 - Form of certificate representing the Series OO Preferred Stock. 4.2 - Deposit Agreement, dated February 4, 2025, among JPMorgan Chase & Co., Computershare Inc., as depositary, and the holders from time to time of Depositary Receipts. 4.3 - Form of Depositary Receipt (included as part of Exhibit 4.2). 5.1 - Opinion of Simpson Thacher & Bartlett LLP as to the legality of the 6.500% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series OO and the Depositary Shares. 23.1 - Consent of Simpson Thacher & Bartlett LLP (included as part of Exhibit 5.1). 101 - Pursuant to Rule 406 of Regulation S-T, the cover page is formatted in Inline XBRL (Inline eXtensible Business Reporting Language). 104 - Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document and included in Exhibit 101).

4.1: Form of certificate representing the Series OO Preferred Stock.
4.2: Deposit Agreement, dated February 4, 2025, among JPMorgan Chase & Co., Computershare Inc., as depositary, and the holders from time to time of Depositary Receipts.
4.3: Form of Depositary Receipt (included as part of Exhibit 4.2).
5.1: Opinion of Simpson Thacher & Bartlett LLP as to the legality of the 6.500% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series OO and the Depositary Shares.
